admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
Essentially an integrated credit
            program, the project consists of two interrelated
            subprojects: one for village livestock development in the
            Northeastern Highlands of Turkey, and the other for
            livestock fattening. The project aims at both meat and milk
            production by increasing both cattle and sheep breeding
            herds and offtake in the Northeast, and through fattening
            this underfinished offtake and other available animals,
            mainly in the adjoining Anatolian Plateau, to heavier
            weights prior to slaughter. In addition, the project would
            assist, through consultants, in the development of technical
            services in the Livestock Directorate of the Ministry of Agriculture.
